it wasnt even trolling.

i made an alt in case blubber or any other mod suspended me for a shitty reason (cause they can) and i named it zoe quinn.

most of the IRC saw the name and told me to comment on mr doh page (who is probably the biggest GG leader on kym) with slimes coypasta (the copypasta of a user who was so mad with everyone in KYM, he wrote that and then got banned)

its all a retarded circklejerk.
